config.script:
rid = self.view.params.get("rowIndex", -1)
    pid = "{}_{}".format(self.view.params.get("popupIdPrefix","info"), rid)
    params = {"row": self.view.params.get("row", {})}

    try:
        system.perspective.closePopup(pid)
    except:
        pass

    system.perspective.openPopup(
        id=pid,
        view=self.view.params.get("targetViewPath"),
        params=params,
        title=self.view.params.get("popupTitle","Details"),
        modal=False,
        draggable=True,
        resizable=False,
        showCloseIcon=True,
        overlayDismiss=True,
        size={"width": self.view.params.get("popupWidth", 560),
              "height": self.view.params.get("popupHeight", 420)},
        position={"left": 120, "top": 80}
    )
